attributes.action: Grant 5 years ILR to current Graduate Visa Holders switch to Skilled Worker Visa
attributes.additional_details:
Many of us have employer sponsorship promises pending our Graduate Visa expiration. The 10-year rule may lead employers to reconsider, causing setbacks. We request a 5-year ILR pathway to maintain stability

As significant contributors to UK's economy, healthcare, social care, energy, and other sectors, we believe our efforts warrant consideration. Granting 5-year ILR would recognise our value and support continued growth. 

We urge the government to consider this or the start date for a future date.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to reconsider the 10-year ILR rule for current Graduate Visa holders when making the switch to Skilled Worker Visa, given the initial 5-year promise when we arrived. Retrospective fairness is crucial.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
